params.order: The order that will be approved.
The order that will be permanently canceled.

params.orderHashes: A list of the hashes of the orders to check.

getOrdersStatus(bytes32[]).return: A list of OrderQueryOutput structs containing the status and filled                     amount of each order.

params.price: The current oracle price of the underlying asset.
params.sender: The address that called the trade() function on PerpetualV1.

trade(address,address,address,uint256,by.return: The assets to be traded and traderFlags that indicate that a trade occurred.

getOrdersStatus(bytes32[]).notice: Gets the status (open/approved/canceled) and filled amount of each order in a list.

trade(address,address,address,uint256,by.notice: Allows an account to take an order cryptographically signed by a different account.

userdoc.notice: Contract allowing trading between accounts using cryptographically signed messages.
